tool_description: GeoSource API is a comprehensive service that provides a wealth of geo-information on countries, states, cities, zip codes, currencies, flags, and more. It allows developers to easily access accurate and up-to-date geo-information to enhance their applications and services.

api_list.name: Capital By Country
api_list.description: Retrieves the capital city of the specified country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which to retrieve the capital.

api_list.name: Phone Code By Country
api_list.description: Retrieves the phone code of the specified country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which to retrieve the phone code.

api_list.name: Emoji Flag By Country
api_list.description: Retrieves the emoji flag code of the specified country.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The name of the country for which to retrieve the emoji flag.

api_list.name: Location By City
api_list.description: Retrieves the latitude and longitude of the specified city.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the location.

api_list.name: ZipCode By City
api_list.description: Retrieves the zip code(s) of the specified city (must be in the supported countries list).

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city for which to retrieve the zip code.

api_list.name: Cities By State
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of cities in the specified state.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: The name of the state for which to retrieve the cities.

api_list.name: States By Country
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all states in the specified country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which to retrieve the states.

api_list.name: Currency By Country
api_list.description: Retrieves the currency and currency symbol of the specified country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: The name of the country for which to retrieve the currency.

api_list.name: CountriesList
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all countries and some basic information about them.
